name: Fortune - Battle Royale
description:
Our scratch project has taken off from scratch, and is now on itch.io!

Welcome to Fortune!

Fortune is a scratch version based off of Fortnite Battle Royale. Players will land on the map, and be thrown in matches with AI. Players will fight with weapons until they're the last one standing, or until their fate arrives. Customize your character by heading to the shop, and spend your coupons to by a costume. Coupons can be earned by winning matches and leveling up! 

Controls:

[WASD] Move

[Mouse + E] Pick up weapons

[Space] Jump or Leave Bus

[Mouse} Shoot weapon
